alert.note: Alert for Benton (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 10:07AM PST until January 04 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marys River near Philomath. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 20.8 feet, expect widespread flooding in Philomath, especially on the south side in the vicinity of Chapel drive and Grange Hall Road, in central Benton County, and portions of Corvallis. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM PST Monday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning to 20.9 feet late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM PST.
